background.description: The default background color of the interface.

default.description: The background color of main actions such as primary Buttons.

hover.description: The hover state color of main actions such as primary Buttons.

active.description: The active state (on press) color of main actions such as primary Buttons.

subtlest.description: Use for the background of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

subtle.description: Use for the background of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

elevated.description: The background color for elements with a different height than the interface, such as a Dialog box, Tooltip, or Dropdown Menu.

default.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a banner.

hover.description: The hover state color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

default.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a banner.

hover.description: The hover state color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

card.description: The background color for elements with the highest level of prominence, like a card.

mask.description: The background color of the mask, used to cover the content below the mask. Dialog, Alert Dialog and other components use this token.

item.description: The background color of contained elements with a smaller surface area such as secondary Button and Dropdown Menu Item.

subtle.description: The background color for elements with a secondary level of prominence.

item-hover.description: The hover state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area such as secondary Button and Dropdown Menu Item.

item-selected.description: The selected state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area such as Dropdown Menu Item.

inverse.description: The background color for elements that should stand out in the interface.

muted.description: The background color for muted elements such as TabsList, Skeleton and Switch.

slot.description: Use for background of the Slot component.

default.description: The default color for borders on any element.
Use for borders paired with brand colors.

hover.description: The hover color for borders paired with brand colors.

subtlest.description: Use for the border of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

subtle.description: Use for the border of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for borders paired with brand colors.

default.description: Use for borders communicating critical information.

hover.description: The hover color for borders communicating critical information.

subtlest.description: Use for the border of elements communicating critical information, but with less emphasis.

subtle.description: Use for the border of elements communicating critical information, but with less emphasis.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for borders communicating critical information.

default.description: Use for borders communicating warning information.

hover.description: The hover color for borders communicating warning information.

subtlest.description: Use for the border of elements communicating warning information, but with less emphasis.

subtle.description: Use for the border of elements communicating warning information, but with less emphasis.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for borders communicating warning information.

hover.description: The hover color for borders on any element.

slot.description: Use for border of the Slot component.

description.description: Use for text with a secondary level of prominence.

default.description: The default text color.

placeholder.description: Use for text indicating placeholder on elements with a smaller surface area, like an input.

inverse.description: Use for text on dark background.

default.description: Use for text links.

hover.description: The hover state color for text links.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for text links.

inverse.description: Use for text on bg-brand, like primary buttons.

strong.description: Use for text on bg-brand-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

default.description: Use for text communicating critical information.

hover.description: The hover state color for text communicating critical information.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating critical information.

strong.description: Use for text on bg-danger-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

default.description: Use for text communicating warning.

hover.description: The hover state color for text communicating warning.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating warning.

strong.description: Use for text on bg-warning-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

slot.description: Use for text of the Slot component.

default.description: The default color for icons.

hover.description: The hover state color for icons.

default.description: Use for icons that need to pull more focus.

hover.description: The hover color for icons that need to pull more focus.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons that need to pull more focus.

strong.description: Use for icon on bg-brand-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

inverse.description: Use for icon on bg-brand, like primary buttons.

default.description: Use for icons communicating critical information.

hover.description: The hover color for icons communicating critical information.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons communicating critical information.

strong.description: Use for icon on bg-danger-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

default.description: Use for icons communicating warning information.

hover.description: The hover color for icons communicating warning information.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons communicating warning information.

strong.description: Use for icon on bg-warning-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons.

inverse.description: Use for icon on dark background.

slot.description: Use for icon of the Slot component.

none.description: Use for resetting the default border radius.

sm.description: Use in small size components, such as Checkbox and Segmented.

default.description: Use in default components, such as Buttons and Inputs.

lg.description: Use in large components, such as Card and Dialog.

full.description: Use for having the maximum possible border radius.

0.description: Use for resetting the default border width.

1.description: Use in default components, such as Buttons and Inputs.

2.description: Use for focus rings and large borders, such as Slider and Switch.

xs.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the vertical mobile device resolution.

sm.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the horizontal mobile device resolution.

md.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the vertical tablet device resolution.

lg.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the horizontal tablet device resolution.

xl.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the small desktop device resolution.

2xl.description: Use for responsive modifiers (e.g. `md:text-center`), the value is the min-width where that breakpoint should start. The breakpoint is inspired by the large desktop device resolution.

visible.description: Apply to content that is completely visible.

hover.description: Apply to content when in an hover state.

disabled.description: Apply to content when in a disabled state.

loading.description: Apply to content when in a loading state.

invisible.description: Apply to content that is completely invisible.

Name.description: An utility token that represents the Design System name.

Version.description: An utility token that represents the Design System version.

Brand.description: An utility token that represents the Brand that uses the Design System.
